body:
I got the crash logs

Tested Nexus5/lollipop and Nexus7/kitkit and they exhibit different types
of logs. malloc deadlock?.

cmp=org.golang.todo.main/android.app.NativeActivity (has extras)} from uid
10022 on display 0
